model.realnvp module¶

class model.realnvp.RealNVP(Nvars, Nlayers=2, Hs=10, Ht=10)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Args:
Nvars (int): number variables Nlayers (int): number of layers Hs (int): number of hidden neurons of the s neural network Ht (int): number of hidden neurons of the t neural network
backward(z)¶

x = f^{-1}(z) = g(z)

forward(x)¶

z = f(x)

logp(x)¶

logp(x) = logp(z) + logdet
